segments.text: Bad . My nose keeps running . And my forehead is burning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said you never went to hospital .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The good thing is you don't need to go to school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I love that , no class , no homework , and no exams .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And your Mom and Dad will buy you anything you ask for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha , I just got the Ultraman costume . My Dad bought it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , I got numerous shots for that . You have no idea what I've been through with the needles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your sister said you fainted three times during the injection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May told you ? Oh , May , she's such a tattletale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No matter what , you are still my hero , Daniel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tom , promise me to keep this a secret , will you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I promise . You promise you will be well soon ?
segments.speaker: S1
